review_en: I visited with my boyfriend to relieve my depressed mood. When I saw the staff's faces at Lotte World, I wasn't as excited as I was. Everyone waved their hands without a soul and guided us on the ride with no expression on their faces. I think it's right that you looked tired and tired. When I saw all the staff members with that look on their faces, it wasn't a matter of unkindness, but I wondered how the welfare of the staff would be achieved so that there could be no one working with a smile. On the other hand, the parade made me feel good enough to melt my disappointment. largest

review_en: I visited Lotte World with my boyfriend on weekdays after taking annual leave of course. I thought there wouldn't be any people because it was an ambiguous Thursday, but I was worried about waiting time because there were more people than I thought! However, I was able to enjoy Art Lantis twice without waiting time because I learned Lotte World's tips using the app in advance. When others wait more than 30 minutes, the sense of superiority goes right in... I felt like I was winning. Of course, it was hard to make a reservation as much as the university registration, but I also had a little bit of motion sickness but it was fun because there were new rides using various vr.

review_en: I cut the free pass on the swing and waited for 2 hours for the ghost until 3:30-45, and I thought the free pass time would pass. So I pressed cancel for 38 minutes. So I gave up on the ghost and went to the spinning swing, and they said I couldn't ride the canceled free pass. I couldn't ride both the Ghost and the merry-go-round that I waited for two hours. I'm sure it says no cancellation, and the receptionists say no. I'm so disappointed and I don't want to come back to Lotte World again. Be careful, everyone.;;

review_en: I think FANTASY DREAM has improved a lot. The lights have changed and the movements of the dolls have improved a little. It was really nice to see. Unfortunately, the delicate parts (candies, eyebrows, etc.) are not moving. I really hope that will improve, too. It was so real in the old video, but now I can see that the movements of the dolls are completely different. There are dolls that aren't moving now, like, a buggy-type bike ride. I saw that Grandfather Magician's face was moving just a little by little. I don't think we're good enough yet.

review_en: I often go to Lotte Department Store and Lotte Mart because my house is close.I didn't go to Lotte World often, but my friends from abroad came and we went to the amusement park together. It was a weekday so I was able to play comfortably because there were not many people. review_en: Lotte World is the largest amusement park in Seoul where you can visit anytime in all four seasons. The indoor and outdoor are separated, so you can enjoy it all the time whether it rains or snow. It is also close to Lotte Department Store, Lotte Mart, and Lotte Hotel, so it is convenient for sightseeing and eating. The Lotte World Parade will be performed twice at 2 p.m. and 8:30 p.m. There is a place to eat in Lotte World, and if you go to the folk museum located on the 3rd floor of Lotte World, it is good to have a traditional Korean restaurant.

review_en: Lotte World, a land of adventure and mystery! Traffic is also located in Jamsil, so it's easy to move around, there's a lot to eat around, and it's a perfect place to have fun on your day off! It is connected indoors and outdoors, so it is good to eat because there are many restaurants and rides on the road! Especially, I like the parade because there are so many things to see in different time zones! Lotte World is good to visit and play with friends on holidays! I strongly recommend it!

review_en: As the indoor and outdoor areas are divided, it is good that they are not affected by the weather unlike other amusement parks. In particular, various rides are well decorated with fun themes suitable for the purpose of the amusement park. I think it's a good place to go when you want to get out of reality and have a childhood innocence or go on scary rides. Moreover, this place is very accessible because of its convenient transportation. Even after getting off the subway, I didn't walk for five minutes, so I can see the entrance right in front of me. It's a good place to go.

review_en: There is a place where not only young children but also adults' hearts melt at once. There is a place where you wake up your sleeping childhood innocence and bring back your disappearing pure heart. Even if you don't have to ride the rides yourself, you can feel the atmosphere here and laugh enough for the children. The smile is built and the mind is calm. It's been a long time since I last saw Lotte World. When I was in college, I used to come to church with my friends once in a while, but after I became a member of society, it's hard to get together and I don't have to come. The curious girl is tall.
